abstract: Valeant Pharmaceuticals International unveils new plan that simplifies and expands its previous discount program for two heart medications, Nitropress and Isuprel; announcement follows Congressional hearings on complaints firm failed in its 2015 pledge to give price cuts to hospitals and large purchasers.

headline.print_headline: Valeant Expands Drug Discount Offer After Criticism
headline.main: Valeant Pharmaceuticals Expands Drug Discount Offer After Criticism

snippet: The company said hospitals would be eligible for a discount of 10 percent to 40 percent on the heart drugs Nitropress and Isuprel.
lead_paragraph: The company said hospitals would be eligible for a discount of 10 percent to 40 percent on the heart drugs Nitropress and Isuprel.
